Types of Planets

  1. Dwarf

    A dwarf planet is a planetary-mass object that is neither a planet nor a satelite.

  2. Terrestrial

    A terrestrial planet, telluric planet or rocky planet

  3. Gas Giant

    A gas-giant is a large planet that is not primarily composed
